casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Montrell BROWN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 27, 2018

Robert E. Byron, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 182 Conn. App. 112, 189 A.3d 127 (2018), is denied.
